About the Company: Womens Next Loungeries, incorporated in 2010, is a womens lingerie manufacturer. The company is founded by Bhavesh Bhanushali who has over 15 years of expertise in core areas of the companys business. The company specializes in womens inner wear segment and is engaged in the business of designing, manufacturing, branding and marketing of lingerie wear, honeymoon set, intimate wear etc. The company markets the products through brands Valentine Pink and Womens Next. The company has set out footing in domestic market and have strong retail presence through malls and grade A retail outlets across Tier I and II cities such as Mumbai, Delhi, Ahmedabad and the like. The companys manufacturing plant is situated at Bhiwandi, Thane. The company markets its products through a chain of distributors and retail outlets.
